text: 24 is a 2001 Czech thriller movie. It was directed by David Beránek and stars Barbora Seidlová and Martin Trnavský. It happens during 24 hours and follows a man and a woman on the run in the Czech Republic. The movie was released through Bontonfilm on 11 January 2001. ==Cast== * Pavel Trnavský as Martin * Barbora Seidlová as dívka * Jiří Tomek as grandfather ==References== Category:2001 thriller movies Category:2000s road movies Category:Czech thriller movies
title: 24 (2001 movie)
